PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART IV) which authorize the Minister to extend the validity period of medical certificates, instrument ratings or flight instructor ratings, and the conditions under which such extensions shall be granted, as of December 1, 1998.
